name: Ganymede Consultancy
goal:
To provide consultancy on organisation issues with a focus on human resources, diversity and inclusion, human resource development and communications.
Secondly to support organisations in developping policies on the above.
Thirdly to provide training, education and information about these and related subjects.
Last, to create awareness of the needs for continueous improvement of policies and circumstances on these subject.
interests: Communication, Culture, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Youth
euInitiatives: Non-discrimination issues, Labour law, LGBT rights, Women rights, Education, Youth, Elderly rights, Consumer Protection
